preReadQuiz.description: Take this quiz to test your understanding of Responsive Layouts!

questions.description: True or False - Flex items by default are stacked in a column
questions.explanation: Row is the default property for flex-direction

questions.description: Which of these media queries would target screens larger than 900px?
questions.explanation: Option 2 would apply at less than 900px, not larger. Option 3 targets print, not screen.

questions.description: Which of the following values is not valid for setting the "justify-content" property?
questions.explanation: Flex-between is not a valid value for any CSS property.
